summary: The Dynasty armor as it should be
descriptionHtml:
Presenting my Dynasty armor mashup in Dark Crimson and White. It combines a number of mods together (full credit to the authors below) to create the beautiful armor you see. All the meshes and textures are the work of others, I used the creation kit and nifskope to blend it all together.

There is a BBP version and a non BBP version - for BBP make sure you have a compatible skeleton. TBBP will work as well.

In each version you will find multiple variations of the armor. Dark crimson and white, both with and without stockings. Heavy and light versions of all. There is a choker collar of each color as well.

Please endorse if you like the mod so others can find it easier!


HOW TO GET:

This can be crafted under steel or use the console and type 'help dynasty'. There are separate curiass's, one with the stocking and one without.


REQUIREMENTS:

-CBBE
-For the BBP file a BBP skeleton is required like XPS's. The regular version of the file does not require a BBP skeleton.

INSTALL:

-Pick either the BBP or the non BBP file and use NMM to install.

NOTES:

Note 1 - The helmet crown is invisible, you get the armor for it but not the look by equipping it. Â  This is by design.
Note 2 - Heavy and light versions of both colors, weight slider supported.


UPDATES:

V2.1 - Minor update
-Shield mesh corrected

V2 - Major update:
-Now the Dark Crimson and White sets have been combined into one esp. So there is just a BBP and regular version.
-Light armors corrected.
-Chainmail removed.
-White and black neck choker added.
-All versions can be crafted correctly under Steel.
-All versions can be enchanted correctly.
-Cleaned up file structure.

V1 - Initial release:
- Includes Dark Crimson and White sets. CBBE regular and CBBE BBP. There is a slight clipping issue between the stocking versions and the top of the thigh armor. Will work on that.


CREDITS:

Dynasty armor:

Various sources, so big thanks to codecrackerx9, drakishar, cchoay, Simomax, haldir307
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7270/

Stockings: Casual bikini shoes gloves stockings for UNP UNPB BBP CBBE ADEC by newmiller
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22933/

G-String: Lingerie Set -CBBE 3_2 By Nausicaa
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28714

Choker: Sweet and Sexy Lingerie shop CBBE by Nikitaa
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25389]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25389[/url]

If I forgot anyone, it was unintentional. Please let me know via PM and I will credit asap.


PERMISSIONS:

Before using any asset from this mod, please request permission from myself and the original mesh and texture authors.
author: dives41
